items: Are mapped types used to create variations of existing types (Readonly, Partial)?
Is 'keyof' used correctly to iterate over keys?
Are modifiers (+/- readonly, ?) used to add or remove properties?
Is 'as' clause used for key remapping (TS 4.1+)?
Are mapped types used to enforce consistency across related types?
Are built-in mapped types (Pick, Omit, Record) used?
